name: Rhynosaber the Mad-Dash Armory
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can discard any number of cards; this card gains 700 ATK for each card discarded. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon any number of monsters from your GY, except "Rhynosaber the Mad-Dash Armory", whose total Levels equal 7, but negate their effects. You can only use each effect of "Rhynosaber the Mad-Dash Armory" once per turn.
